specification.preconditions: - The input array must have at least 8 elements.
specification.postconditions:
- The element at index 4 in the output array is equal to the element at index 4 in the input array plus 3.
- The element at index 7 in the output array is 516.
- For all indices i not equal to 4 or 7 (and i less than the size of the array), the output array element equals the corresponding input array element.
